author: aljones909
post: Hugh said “I, on the other hand, would stake several dollars that any new radiocarbon test would confirm a medieval date.”. I’d go much further – I’d stake my house on it. My wife would probably object but I think I could convince her that £10,000 would be a good investment. An even money bet on the shroud being medieval would be the bargain of this century..
title: A Guest Posting by Joe Marino:  If another C-14 test is ever done . . .
